scripts.script: select l.*,n.nodeName,f.name userName from r_order_log l,f_flownode n ,p_staff f where l.orderId = ? and l.action = n.id and f.id = l.userId order by timestamp asc
insert into r_order_log(orderId,userId,action,remark)values(?,?,?,?)
select CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(r.`timestamp`,'%Y%m%d'),lpad(count(1)+1,4,'0')) orderno from r_order r where DATE_FORMAT(r.`timestamp`,'%Y%m%d') = date_format(now(),'%Y%m%d')
update r_order set curNode =7 ,oprState = 8 where id = ?
update r_orderitem set oprState =8 where orderId = ?
insert into r_order_his select * from r_order where id = ?
update r_orderitem o set o.oprState = 9 where o.orderId = ?
update r_order set shipAddress = ? , remark = ? , totalPay = ?, prePay=?, totalPrd=?, curNode=?, curOperator=? where id = ?
select o.*,fn.nodeName,f.name as creator ,f1.name as curOper from r_order o,f_flownode fn,p_staff f,p_staff f1 where o.curNode = fn.id and f.Id = o.staffId and f1.Id = o.curOperator and o.id = ?
select * from r_orderitem where orderId = ? and oprState=0 order by prdId,prdColorId

SELECT * from (select o.id,o.curNode,fn.nodeName,o.custName,o.totalPrd,o.totalPay, o.staffId,f.name as creator ,o.curOperator,f1.name as curOper,o.timestamp,o.oprState from r_order o,f_flownode fn,p_staff f,p_staff f1 where o.curNode = fn.id and f.Id = o.staffId and f1.Id = o.curOperator ) a where 1=1

SELECT count(*) from (select o.id,o.curNode,fn.nodeName,o.custName,o.totalPrd,o.totalPay,o.staffId,f.name as creator ,o.curOperator,f1.name as curOper,o.timestamp from r_order o,f_flownode fn,p_staff f,p_staff f1 where o.curNode = fn.id and f.Id = o.staffId and f1.Id = o.curOperator ) a where 1=1

SELECT count(1) from (select o.id,o.curNode,fn.nodeName,o.custName,o.totalPrd,o.totalPay, o.staffId,f.name as creator ,o.curOperator,f1.name as curOper,o.timestamp,o.oprState from r_order o,f_flownode fn,p_staff f,p_staff f1 where o.curNode = fn.id and f.Id = o.staffId and f1.Id = o.curOperator ) a where 1=1 and curOperator = ?
select count(1) from r_order o where o.staffId = ?
insert into r_order(Id,name,flowId,curNode,custName,staffId,totalPay,prePay,totalPrd,shipAddress,curOperator) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
insert into r_orderitem(orderId,prdId,prdColorId,prdColorNo,prdColorName,nxxl,nxl,nl,nm,ns,prdNum,price,subTotal) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
select max(id)+1 from r_order
select rf.staffId from f_flownode fn,p_rolestaff rf where rf.roleId = fn.roleId and fn.flowId = ? and fn.id = ?

update r_orderitem o set o.prdNum = o.nxxl + o.nxl + o.nl + o.nm + o.ns , o.price = (select if((o.nxxl + o.nxl + o.nl + o.nm + o.ns) >= 30,p.batchPrice,p.price) from c_product p where p.id = o.prdId), o.subtotal = (select (if((o.nxxl + o.nxl + o.nl + o.nm + o.ns) >= 30,p.batchPrice,p.price))*(nxxl + o.nxl + o.nl + o.nm + o.ns) from c_product p where p.id = o.prdId) where o.orderId = ?

update r_order o set o.totalPay = (select sum(subTotal) from r_orderitem i where i.orderId = o.id), o.prePay = (select sum(subTotal)*0.4 from r_orderitem i where i.orderId = o.id), o.lastPay = (select sum(subTotal)*0.6 from r_orderitem i where i.orderId = o.id), o.totalPrd = (select sum(prdNum) from r_orderitem i where i.orderId = o.id) where id = ?
delete r_order o where o.id = ?
delete r_orderitem o where o.orderId = ?
select max(timestamp) timestamp, count(*) cnt, (select s.loginIp from s_syslog s where s.staffId = a.staffId ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 1 )loginIp from s_syslog a where a.staffId = ?
insert into s_syslog(staffId,loginIp,action)values(?,?,?)

select a.Id,a.name,a.deptId,a.telphone1,a.telphone2,a.loginName,d.deptName,max(l.timestamp) timestamp,sum(1) cnt, (select s.loginIp from s_syslog s where s.staffId = l.staffId ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 1 ) loginIp from p_staff a INNER JOIN p_deptstaff df ON df.staffId = a.id INNER JOIN p_dept d ON d.id = df.deptId left join s_syslog l on a.id = l.staffId WHERE a.loginName = ? and a.loginPwd =? AND a.isVaild = 0 GROUP BY a.Id,a.name,a.deptId,a.telphone1,a.telphone2,a.loginName,d.deptName

select p.Id,p.permName,p.permUrl,p.remark,p.pId,p.orderIndex,p.icon,p.permType from p_rolestaff rf,p_roleperm rp , p_permission p where rf.staffId = ? and rf.roleId = rp.roleId and rp.permId = p.id order by p.orderIndex
select r.* from p_roles r,p_rolestaff rf where r.Id = rf.roleId and rf.staffId=?
select p.*,d.dictval catalog_name from c_product p,p_dict d where p.prdName like ? and d.dictName = 'catalog' and p.catalog = d.dictKey limit ?,?
select count(1) from c_product p where p.prdName like ?
select p.*,d.dictval catalog_name from c_product p,p_dict d where p.Id = ? and d.dictName = 'catalog' and p.catalog = d.dictKey
select * from c_produt_color pc where pc.prdID = ?
